right.text: i hated making speeches in school. in fact, one time i did a speech entitled "why i hate speeches", which was witty and original

left.text: it's like at SCHOOL when i was in class i would weave subliminal messages in my speeches that would drive certain people bonkers; but they had nothing with which to reply

right.text: man, he sure couldn't have been being SARCASTIC
